title: IP is stuck at 5833??
body: is anyone els having this problem, i just want to buy Aatrox but apparently the shop says my balance is stuck at 5833 IP, even tho i have 6624 IP

replies.body: Thanks for the report Jo. We're currently looking into the problem and[ will keep everyone updated in the main discussion thread.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/FKoAQK2M-not-enough-ip-bug)
